verbose_text: For the EPM test, DSS induced colitis mice displayed significantly fewer entries into the open arm (OE%) (XREF_FIG) and spent significantly less time in the open arm (OT%) than the NG mice (XREF_FIG, P < 0.05).
evidence: DSS-induced colitis mice displayed significantly fewer entries into the open arm (OE %) ( XREF_FIG ) and spent significantly less time in the open arm
